price: Kim de mümin ve doğruları yapmış olarak gelirse, işte onlar için de en yüksek dereceler vardır.
arabic: وَمَن يَأۡتِهِۦ مُؤۡمِنٗا قَدۡ عَمِلَ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمُ ٱلدَّرَجَٰتُ ٱلۡعُلَىٰ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waman yatihi mu'minan qad ʿamila al-ṣāliḥāti fa-ulāika lahumu al-darajātu al-ʿulā
